abstract: Pres Obama nominates Coast Guard Vice Adm Peter V Neffenger to head Transportation Security Admin, which runs security at more than 450 airports in United States.
lead_paragraph: President Obama on Tuesday nominated the Coast Guard’s second-in-command to head the Transportation Security Administration, which runs security operations at more than 450 airports.

headline.main: Coast Guard’s No. 2 Is Nominated to Lead T.S.A.
headline.print_headline: Coast Guard’s No. 2 Is Nominated To Lead T.S.A.

snippet: President Obama on Tuesday nominated the Coast Guard’s second-in-command to head the Transportation Security Administration, which runs security operations at more than 450 airports.
